com.bandyer.core_av.publisher

Class Publisher

  • com.bandyer.core_av.publisher.Publisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CapturerObserver

    public class Publisher
implements CapturerObserver

    This class represents a publisher of a stream. A publisher is someone who is in read-write mode on a stream. There can be only one local publisher at a time in the room. The publisher needs a capturer ( audio/video ) to be able to fetch the data to stream.

    The first step to use the publisher is create it, by instantiating with a user it refers to.

      • setCapturer

        public Publisher setCapturer(AbstractBaseCapturer<?> capturer,
                             boolean autoDispose,
                             com.bandyer.core_av.networking.models.MuteStreamOption muteOption)

        Method to set the capturer to be used, and the additional options such as mute a channel

        Parameters:
        capturer - can be CapturerAV/CapturerAudio/CapturerVideo
        autoDispose - by default the capturer will be disposed along side with the publisher, if set to false the developer will need to handle the disposal
        muteOption - option to mute a channel that is being captured
        Returns:
        Publisher
